But if this plan of procedure in the business seems 6 to you to be dangerous, another course commends itself to us, that if the king has kept faith with those friends of yours who have lent him sums of money throughout your province and the provinces under your command, you should assist him with your troops and supplies, knowing that the nature and geographical position of your province is such, that you would either secure his return by assisting him, or hinder it by ignoring him.
